function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of hazard elimination measures for potential exposure to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of COVID-19 transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Implementing effective hazard elimination measures and controls","Technologies":"Building configuration and systems modification, air filtration systems","People":"Occupants of built environments","Owner":"Building owners, construction companies"},{"Description":"Inadequate implementation of administrative controls for COVID-19","Impact":"Higher probability of airborne transmission pathways and increased exposure in indoor environments","Mitigation":"Instruction based on rapid, continuous, and updated scientific evidence, and understanding of transmission exposures","Technologies":"Rapid testing technology, air quality monitoring systems","People":"Building occupants, public health authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inconsistent compliance with PPE recommendations for COVID-19","Impact":"Greater risk of infection due to lack of personal protective measures","Mitigation":"Regularly checking and implementing updated PPE recommendations from OSHA and CDC","Technologies":"PPE monitoring systems, contact tracing technology","People":"Individuals in public and private spaces","Owner":"Public health authorities, employers"}]}
